feat: Add comprehensive admin panel with 7 income streams and NWM-friendly payment gateways

## Admin Panel System
- Add complete admin panel at /admin.html with secret access (click "Z2B Legacy Builders" 5 times)
- Full CRUD operations for tiers, users, content, branding, compensation, and statistics
- JWT authentication with secure login (admin / Admin@Z2B2024!)
- Real-time dashboard with statistics and management controls

## Backend Infrastructure
- Node.js + Express backend server on port 5000
- MongoDB Atlas cloud database integration
- RESTful API with authentication middleware
- Database models: Settings, Users, Content, PaymentGateway, Statistics
- Complete API routes for all admin operations
- Static file serving for frontend access

## 7 Income Streams (Correct Configuration)
1. ISP (Individual Sales Profit): 20%-45% by tier - Paid Monthly
2. QPB (Quick Pathfinder Bonus): 7.5% first 3, 10% subsequent - Paid Monthly
3. TSC (Team Sales Commission): 10 levels (G1:10%, G2:5%, G3:3%, G4:2%, G5-10:1%) - Paid Monthly
4. TPB (Team Performance Bonus): Up to 10% subject to tier - Paid Quarterly
5. TLI (Team Leadership Incentive): R2.5K-R5M pool - Paid Quarterly (CEO Approved)
6. CEO (CEO Awards & Competitions): Variable rewards - Paid Quarterly
7. MKT (Marketplace Sales): 95% seller keeps, 5% platform fee - Paid Monthly

## Payment Gateway Updates
- Replace PayPal and Stripe with NWM-friendly alternatives
- Add Payfast: South African multi-payment (cards, EFT, SnapScan, Zapper)
- Add CoinPayments: Cryptocurrency gateway (2000+ coins, BTC, ETH, USDT, etc.)
- Keep Yoco and Bank Transfer options
- All gateways manageable from admin panel

## Frontend Updates
- marketplace.html: Fix "Pay as You Go" box styling (gold background, navy text)
- marketplace.html: Add Enterprise Edition monthly note with customized Coach ManLaw training
- dashboard.html: Add secret admin trigger in footer
- All pages now served through backend for proper CORS handling

## Documentation
- PAYMENT_GATEWAY_UPDATE.md: Complete payment gateway transition guide
- backend/QUICK_START.md: MongoDB Atlas setup instructions
- backend/PAYMENT_GATEWAYS_GUIDE.md: Detailed gateway configuration guide
- backend/README.md: Backend architecture and setup

Access: http://localhost:5000/admin.html
Credentials: admin / Admin@Z2B2024!
